cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 90 miles south of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest today, then turning northwest tonight and northward Sunday night toward the northern Gulf Coast (Florida Panhandle/Alabama)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northern Gulf Coast near the Florida Panhandle / Alabama coast
